The mass media, including television, radio and newspapers, have great influence in shaping people's ideas. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement? Give reasons for your answer.

There are various forms of mass media, which include television, radio, and newspapers. Media acts as a communication channel by updating viewers regarding the latest news which are happening around the world. 

In the present generation, media has a major influence in shaping people's idea. I completely agree with this statement. Considering an example, most of the cine stars use mass media as a source to promote their movies. The movies are marketed using all forms of media in such a way that the viewers are compelled to watch the movie. Many regional movies are advertised using various forms of media as super hit on the very next day of its release, which isn't true but it has a major influence on the viewers. People are influenced by the promotions and rush to cinema hall to watch the movie, many movies have benefited using mass media as a tool to have a better reach to the public. Thus, I would like to say that media has a thought provoking impact on the general public.

 Media is an powerful source, if used in a right way it is a boon but if misused it is a bane. Media has ability to inject thoughts into people which can make or break a person's image. Hence, I can summarize that media must always be used for the betterment of the society by educating viewers on what's happening around the world in an unbiased way. Media must always be for the people, by the people and of the people.
